definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
shinjitai, simplified Japanese character used since 1946
kyujitai, traditional Japanese character used before 1946

sentences.english: The large print makes for  easier reading.
Which typeface is perfect for this design?
sentences.chinese: 哪個字體最適合這個設計？

sentences.english: The larger the font size is, the easier it is for readers to actually read the text presented on a given web-page.
sentences.chinese: 字體越大，讀者越容易看到呈現在網頁上的內容。

sentences.english: It is printed using a MICR character font as shown above.
sentences.chinese: 這是印使用的MICR如上所示的字符字體。

sentences.english: Kerning is only available for certain font types and, for printed documents, only works if your printer supports it.
sentences.chinese: 這選項是否有效取決於使用的字體和打印機是否支持。

sentences.english: The coin of natural patina, font dignified atmosphere, is perfectly preserved.
sentences.chinese: 該錢幣包漿自然，字體端莊大氣，品相保存完美。

sentences.english: This paper presented a method of extracting drawing order from static handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種提取靜態字體筆順信息的方法。

sentences.english: Gets or sets the background color of the subitem's text.
sentences.chinese: 獲取或設置子項顯示的文本的字體。

sentences.english: Fuk golden words below to apply the same process for "Fu as the East China Sea water" font.
sentences.chinese: 金色福字下方採用同樣的工藝作“福如東海水”字體。

sentences.english: Decorative design usually edging the page or type.
sentences.chinese: 用來圍繞頁邊或字體的裝飾設計。

sentences.english: Whichever typeface you select, choose on that is highly legible.
sentences.chinese: 你選擇那種字體，，即清晰易讀。

sentences.english: Style for label with large font.
Notice how different the fonts are from each other in terms of thickness.
sentences.chinese: 注意這兩種字體之間的區別就在於顏色濃度的不同。

sentences.english: For more information, see Changing WebPage fonts and background colors.
sentences.chinese: 詳細信息，請參閱更改網頁的字體和背景色。

sentences.english: Hard-to-readfonts are a fast way to get your resume on the bottom of any HRmanager’s stack.
sentences.chinese: 簡歷上難讀的字體是最容易讓人事經理髮怒的一件事。

definition: simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
style of writing (literary style)/way of writing a character/spelling
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
